message: Do you still remember those old jokes we used to laugh at? I hope those kind of memories can boost your mood when you're having a rough day.
I really like being around you. I hope your days will always be filled with blessings and you always find ways to be grateful.
Let's live in the present.
As Dr. Lauren Fogel Mersy said: 'Deep breathing is our nervous system’s love language.'
I'm sorry if I have ever left bruises on your body, or wounds in your heart, or even scars on your mind.
There is a saying that 'Vulnerability sounds like truth and feels like courage. Truth and courage aren’t always comfortable, but they're never weakness.'
Somewhere, somehow, someone feels happy just knowing you're alive.
note: Be and keep the genuine people around~

message: No matter how difficult today feels, remember that storms always pass. The sun will shine again, and so will you.
Your presence alone makes the world a little brighter. Even if you don’t always see it, you matter more than you know.
Even on the hardest days, I hope you find small moments of joy—like a warm drink, a favorite song, or a kind word.
You don’t have to carry everything alone. It’s okay to lean on others, to rest, and to just be.
Mistakes don’t define you. Growth does. Keep moving forward, one step at a time.
Your heart is a garden. Nurture it with patience, kindness, and self-love. Beautiful things will bloom in time.
If today feels like a mountain, just take it one step at a time. Progress is still progress, no matter the pace.
Your journey is uniquely yours, and every step you take matters. Don't rush, just keep moving forward.
Sometimes, the best thing you can do is pause, take a deep breath, and remind yourself that you're enough just as you are.
The world is better because you're in it. Never forget that your kindness, your laughter, and your presence make a difference.
It’s okay to rest. It’s okay to slow down. You are not a machine; you deserve care too.
Even if today feels heavy, I hope tomorrow feels a little lighter. Keep holding on, brighter days are ahead.
You don’t need to have everything figured out right now. Life unfolds at its own pace, and that's okay.
No act of kindness is ever wasted, no matter how small. Keep being the wonderful person you are.
Growth isn't always visible, but that doesn't mean it isn't happening. Keep believing in yourself.
You deserve the same kindness and love that you so freely give to others.
Every sunrise is a fresh start, a chance to begin again. Let go of yesterday and embrace today.
Your feelings are valid, your struggles are real, and your resilience is inspiring.
note: I see you, I appreciate you~

message: You don’t have to be perfect to be worthy. You already are, just as you are.
Healing isn’t linear. Some days will be tough, but each one brings you closer to peace.
Even if today didn't go as planned, tomorrow is a new chance to try again. You are capable of great things.
